french: 1re Division Française Libre (1st Free French Division)
italian: 1ª Squadra, 1ª Compagnia, I Battaglione, 27º Reggimento Fanteria "Pavia"

deployment.location: Mersa Matruh area, Western Desert, Egypt
Baggush Box (Maaten Baggush), 35 miles east of Mersa Matruh, Egypt
Egypt (Western Desert, Operation Compass sector Dec 9-11; transferring to Sudan from Dec 12)
Mersa Matruh, Egypt (until 9 December); Mobile HQ during Operation Compass (9 Dec onwards)
Helwan Camp, Egypt (January 1941); Athens/Olympus Pass, Greece (March 1941)
Sudan (January-March 1941), participating in East African Campaign
In transit - Suez, Egypt (arrived 3 May 1941), deploying to Mersa Matruh
In transit - UK (April 12-June 13), Egypt (June 14 onward), Cyprus (July 25 onward)
East Africa - Eritrea (April), Asmara (captured 1 April), Massawa area (May-June)
Western Desert, Egypt (mobile headquarters during Operation Crusader)
Maaten Baggush, Egypt (forward operational HQ during Operation Crusader)
Egypt (newly arrived from United Kingdom, July-August 1942)
Mobile HQ, Western Desert - Libya (pursuit from El Alamein to El Agheila)

units.unit_designation: 1re Division Française Libre (1st Free French Division)

deployment.location: Mobile HQ, Libya/Egypt border region (July-Sept 1942: El Alamein defensive positions)
El Alamein defensive positions (October 1942), then retreating westward toward Tunisia
North Africa, retreat from El Alamein
Sabratha-Surman sector, Libya (coastal defense west of Tripoli)
West of Tripoli, Libya (coastal defense sector)
Libya - Deployed March 1941 (Tripoli, then forward to Misrata/Tobruk sector)

units.unit_designation: 1ª Squadra, 1ª Compagnia, I Battaglione, 27º Reggimento Fanteria "Pavia"

deployment.location: Egypt (forward deployment after Sidi Barrani offensive)
Tripoli area, Libya (coastal defense and reserve role)
Parma, Italy (formation); Deployed to Libya by Q1 1942
Qabr al Farigh (southwest of Derna, Libya)
El Alamein sector, Egypt (coastal sector between Ruweisat Ridge and coast)
El Alamein front, Western Desert, Egypt
El Daba - Fuka area (October-November), Retreat to Tunisia (December)

not_in_africa.designation: 1ª Squadra, 1ª Compagnia, I Battaglione, 27º Reggimento Fanteria "Pavia"
